CustomField.description: Pour le tri dans la liste associée.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( Statut__c ="En cours","3", IF( Statut__c ="A venir","2", IF (Statut__c="Passé","1","null"))) & TEXT(YEAR( Date_de_debut__c )) &
IF (LEN(TEXT(MONTH(Date_de_debut__c)))=1,"0" & TEXT(MONTH(Date_de_debut__c)) ,TEXT(MONTH(Date_de_debut__c))) &
IF (LEN(TEXT(DAY(Date_de_debut__c)))=1,"0" & TEXT(DAY(Date_de_debut__c)) ,TEXT(DAY(Date_de_debut__c)))
CustomField.label: Champ technique
